creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: large, bold characters written horizontally across sheet; two smaller, vertical lines at L; two seals at L; seal at UR; unmounted
inscription: The scented fragrance halts the passing guest. (SA)
markings: L edge, square intaglio and square relief; URC, oval relief
title: Scented Fragrance
